page.title: 20Morwenstow - Playgroup
page.content:
This was founded in 1978 to provide children with a range of toys which they would not normally find at home. We also hope it enables the children to accept the idea of sharing before they go to primary school. The playgroup is open to all children up to school age, but if the child is under 2\ a parent or guardian must stay during the session. There are two sessions weekly during school term, each lasting two hours. The playgroup is run by volunteers who must be qualified and approved by the local Social Services department. There are 21 on the register; average attendance is 15 per session.
These pages were compiled by the children parents and friends of Saint Mark's School, Morwenstow
